jld.title: Get More Clients With a Professional Photo
description: Did you know that lawyers with a professional photo receive more profile views in the Justia Lawyer Directory? They also convert more potential clients into leads through phone calls, website clicks, and contact forms.
Add a high-resolution, professional photo to your Justia Profile today and start reaching more clients. We recommend that this photo be a minimum of 640 px by 640 px.
